content.rendered:
Community & Infrastructural Support

Providing education and training on scientific poultry production, poultry farming, Poultry breeder management, Hatchery and incubation techniques, feed manufacturing and disease control measures through Suguna Institute of Poultry Management (SIPM), an educational institution functioning under the aegis of Suguna Foundation.

Creating an Educated, Sustainable and Culturally vibrant community by providing infrastructural support to Government Schools.
